text: Jennifer Lindsay Stone (born February 12, 1993) is an American actress. She is known for playing Harper Finkle on the television series Wizards of Waverly Place and Harriet Welsh in the movie Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:Arlington, Texas
title: Jennifer Stone
